change_how_your_public_dashboard_looks_a: change how your public dashboard looks and feels.
change_the_user_interface_colors_to_matc: change the user interface colors to match your preferences or usage environment.
comfortable_for_the_eyes_in_low_light: Comfortable for the eyes in low light.
the_default_language_for_displaying_the_: The default language for displaying the main dashboard.
specify_whether_you_want_to_display_the_: Specify whether you want to display the time in 12-hour or 24-hour format.
enable_or_disable_animations_in_the_inte: Enable or disable animations in the interface to improve performance.
oops_the_page_youre_looking_for_doesnt_e: Oops! The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist. It might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable. Please check the URL or go back to the homepage.
click_to_publish_exam_grades_for_all_stu: Click to publish exam grades for all students. You can review and edit grades before final publication.
this_table_shows_the_current_grades_for_: This table shows the current grades for all students. You can modify the grades or add new ones for each exam.
subject: Subject
login_description: Nahrain Central is an academic platform for professors and students to manage grades, schedules, and attendance. It centralizes academic tasks in one place to streamline the educational process.
finish_signup_description: Thank you for registering! Please wait for the head of the department to add your account to the system. You will be notified once your account is activated. The head of the department can add accounts for individuals who have registered or have not yet created an account.
finish_signup_title: The account has been successfully created!
professors_can_publish_student_grades: Professors can publish student grades on Nahrain Central, allowing students to easily view their results and track their academic progress through the platform.
enter_verification_code_displayed_in_goo: Enter the verification code displayed in the Google Authenticator app or TOTP app, then proceed.
enter_the_6_digit_security_code_from_you: Enter the 6-digit security code from your authenticator app.
